nodes.text: An OOM command battle droid was serving as a commander in the Separatist Droid Army during the Battle of Teth.

During the Battle of Teth in 22 BBY, Jedi General Obi-Wan Kenobi arrived on the planet with his Delta-7B Aethersprite starfighter and several V-19 Torrent starfighters. Following this, separatist leader Asajj Ventress made a hologram transmission to the command battle droid, telling him that Kenobi's ships have arrived and that the commander was responsible for holding them off until she finished her mission. The droid then ordered a group of Vulture droids to be launched so they could fight the approaching enemy ships.
